hooks.command: node -e "let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{const i=JSON.parse(d);const cmd=i.tool_input?.command||'';if(/gh pr create/.test(cmd)){const out=i.tool_output?.output||'';const m=out.match(/https:\/\/github.com\/[^/]+\/[^/]+\/pull\/\d+/);if(m){console.error('[Hook] PR created: '+m[0]);const repo=m[0].replace(/https:\/\/github.com\/([^/]+\/[^/]+)\/pull\/\d+/,'$1');const pr=m[0].replace(/.*\/pull\/(\d+)/,'$1');console.error('[Hook] To review: gh pr review '+pr+' --repo '+repo)}}console.log(d)})"

PostToolUse.description: Log PR URL and provide review command after PR creation

hooks.command: node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process');const fs = require('fs');let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{const i=JSON.parse(d);const p=i.tool_input?.file_path;if(p&&fs.existsSync(p)){try{execSync('gofmt -w "' + p + '"', {stdio: 'inherit'});console.error('[Hook] gofmt executed on ' + p)}catch(e){}}console.log(d)})"

node -e "const {execSync} = require('child_process');const fs = require('fs');let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{const i=JSON.parse(d);const p=i.tool_input?.file_path;if(p&&fs.existsSync(p)){try{const output = execSync('go vet "' + p + '" 2>&1', {encoding: 'utf8'});if(output.trim()){console.error('[Hook] go vet output:');console.error(output)}}catch(e){}}console.log(d)})"

PostToolUse.description: Auto-format Go files with gofmt and run go vet after edits
